page.title: 17Living in Gerrards Cross
page.content:
"THE DORMERS" is a house just inbetween C.S.P and Gerrards X.It was built in the 1930's.The owners of the house have lived there for 10 years.The house and garden cover one third of an acre in size.The house is situated near the M25,Denham Aerodrome,and the old main road.The owners and their family enjoy all the amenities of the area.
The road at the back of the garden does not bother them.The only thing that bothers them are the planes that fly overhead from the aerodrome.The house has always been called "The Dormers".They have planning permission to build a house at the bottom of the garden.The father of the family is a doctor in Uxbridge,whilst the mother is a nightnurse.They have a comfortable lifestyle and enjoy living in Gerrards Cross.
